properties.script:
wait_timer_pass = $workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01UOLGRK8EQBX6qqsQpFT8g4I8C05CWXIsB$
wait_timer_unit_pass = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01UOLH2VIOB022xoVMhTPNfwILRS12eA9TA$'

wait_timer_fail = $workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01UOLG4LMIEGX7JfhoXVqY34KaNXiJyy1mr$
wait_timer_unit_fail = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01UOLGH5D59YB1xC4WUSMoYr4oaKcN9h5UK$'

def calc_wait_time(wait_timer_unit,wait_timer):
    if wait_timer_unit.lower() == 'minutes':
        wait_time = wait_timer*60
    elif wait_timer_unit.lower() == 'hours':
        wait_time = wait_timer*60*60
    elif wait_timer_unit.lower() == 'days':
        wait_time = wait_timer*24*60*60
    else:
        wait_time = wait_timer
    return wait_time

wait_time_pass = calc_wait_time(wait_timer_unit_pass,wait_timer_pass)
wait_time_fail = calc_wait_time(wait_timer_unit_fail,wait_timer_fail)
    
wait_time_pass_minute = round(wait_time_pass/60) + 1
wait_time_fail_minute = round(wait_time_fail/60) + 1

input.variable_workflow_01T8JFMU3R1XV1LLRvZhVG: Virtual Engineer has begun analyzing this issue and will update the ticket shortly.
input.variable_workflow_01T8JFV1F6GT52Hqoo25vp: Additional updates will follow shortly after analysis.

properties.script:
import re
device_class = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J3LFY7AZU5I8KbHO7HCKrySMlCeuOvH$'
linuxClasses = ["Red Hat Enterprise Linux", "CAR(CPAR)", "EM7 Admin Portal", "EM7 All-In-One", "EM7 Data Collector", "EM7 Database", "EM7 Message Collector", "Relay Server Appliance", "Relay Server Hosted", "Splunk Cluster Master", "Splunk Deployer", "Splunk heavy Forwarder", "Splunk Indexer", "Splunk Search Head", "M300", "EM-Cloud-Manager", "Prime Infrastructure", "CUC Publisher", "Network Service Orchestrator (NSO)", "4310G Digital Media Player", "Edge 340 Digital Media Player", "Cisco Multiparty Media M820", "MSE", "ISE", "NFVIS", "Kubernetes Cluster", "Kubernetes Master", "Kubernetes Node", "Linux", "Cisco Meeting Management(CMM)", "Cisco Unified Prime License Manager (PLM)", "Intrado", "CUCDM", "Virtualized Voice Browser", "Cisco Live Data", "WAN Automation Engine (WAE)", "Situation Manager", "Cisco Workflow Manager"]
esxiClasses = ["SGVMwareESX", "VMWESX", "Virtual Machine"]
ucsmClasses = ["UCS Manager", "UCS-FI-6296UP", "UCS-FI-6248UP"]
ucVosClasses = ["CUCM Server", "Unity Connection Server", "IM and Presence Server", "Emergency Responder"]
ucsCClasses = ["UCS C200", "UCS C240", "UCS C220 M4", "UCS C240 M4"]
if device_class in linuxClasses or re.search('Linux', device_class):
        clock_output='date'
        command_output = 'uptime -p'
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif re.match('Nexus.*', device_class):
        clock_output='show clock'
        command_output='show system uptime | grep \'System uptime\''
        reload_output = 'show version | i Reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif re.match('APIC.*', device_class):
        clock_output='bash; date'
        command_output = 'show system uptime | grep \'System uptime\''
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif device_class in esxiClasses or re.search('vCenter.*', device_class) or re.search('ESX\(i\).*', device_class):
        clock_output='date'
        command_output= 'uptime -p'
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif device_class in ucsmClasses or re.search('UCS-FI.*', device_class):
        clock_output='connect nxos; show clock'
        command_output = 'connect nxos; show system uptime'
        reload_output = 'connect nxos;  show version | i Reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif device_class in ucVosClasses :
        clock_output='show status'
        command_output = 'show version | i uptime'
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif re.match('.*ISR', device_class) or re.match('ASR*', device_class) or re.match('Catalyst *', device_class):
        clock_output='show clock'
        command_output = 'show version | i uptime'
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
elif device_class in ucsCClasses or re.search('UCS C.*', device_class):
        clock_output = 'show clock'
        command_output = 'show cimc'
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'
else:
        clock_output='show clock'
        command_output = 'show version | i uptime'
        reload_output = 'show ver | i Last reload reason'
        reset_output = 'show ver | i Last reset'

properties.script:
import json
sshstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J4PFDRB20e8isBtffu8M8WzqfkUecI$'
snmpstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J8LTZ7X82N8cfRRVNuN5LmSdOdMUc5$'
pingstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50JCTJ62X47l4qENMJqtjVaohRtqmrm5$'
sshstatus = 'Pass' if sshstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
pingstatus = 'Pass' if pingstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
snmpstatus = 'Pass' if snmpstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
event_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J2WNVGIFP6aRjRs4IB5PgljyV7XUlMr$'

connectivity_result = f"Connectivity Test Results:\nSSH - {sshstatus}\nSNMP - {snmpstatus}\nICMP - {pingstatus}\nEvent ID - {event_id}"
max_check_counter = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U4YWYC3P2023Gf3aGeLKsDkdJPilpTcf4$'
customer = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J48UFITC56oUtjQMEvh6Dbtxkwx7vdB$'
device_name = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J32GQ7KRP5oKHUhjMHhUbYd38AcM8SF$'
incident_number = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J2GZRBUXQ0NV384mVMop7xvM5kQnnWZ$'
event_message = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J5AW9TZ8B3smDvtFSz2OUPWibgZcQvh$'
current_status = 'This high priority ticket has exceeded the maximum reachability checks. Escalating to Engineer.'
next_steps = f'VE will continue to enrich this ticket. It will continue to perform connectivity test every 5 minutes up to {max_check_counter} times. It will only make internal Notes with its findings and will not change ownership or state.'

work_notes = f'Hello {customer},\r\n\r\nDevice: {device_name}\r\nAlarm: {event_message}\r\nTicket Number: {incident_number}\r\n\r\nCurrent Status: {current_status}\r\n\r\nNext Steps: {next_steps}\r\n\r\nThank you,\r\nVirtual Engineer'

connectivity_result = json.dumps(connectivity_result).replace('"','')
work_notes = json.dumps(work_notes).replace('"','')

properties.script:
import json
sshstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J4PFDRB20e8isBtffu8M8WzqfkUecI$'
snmpstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J8LTZ7X82N8cfRRVNuN5LmSdOdMUc5$'

properties.script:
import json
sshstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J4PFDRB20e8isBtffu8M8WzqfkUecI$'

sshstatus = 'Pass' if sshstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
pingstatus = 'Pass' if pingstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
snmpstatus = 'Pass' if snmpstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
event_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J2WNVGIFP6aRjRs4IB5PgljyV7XUlMr$'

connectivity_result = f"Connectivity Test Results:\nSSH - {sshstatus}\nSNMP - {snmpstatus}\nICMP - {pingstatus}\nEvent ID - {event_id}"


max_check_counter = ''
customer = ''
device_name = ''
incident_number = ''
event_message = ''
current_status = 'We have determined that the device is currently reachable. We will check the device status again in 5 mins to confirm reachability. '
next_steps = f'Additional updates will follow shortly after analysis.'

work_notes = f'Hello {customer},\r\n\r\nDevice: {device_name}\r\nAlarm: {event_message}\r\nTicket Number: {incident_number}\r\n\r\nCurrent Status: {current_status}\r\n\r\nNext Steps: {next_steps}\r\n\r\n{connectivity_result}\r\n\r\nThank you,\r\nVirtual Engineer'
work_notes = json.dumps(work_notes).replace('"','')

properties.script:
import json
sshstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J4PFDRB20e8isBtffu8M8WzqfkUecI$'
snmpstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J8LTZ7X82N8cfRRVNuN5LmSdOdMUc5$'
pingstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50JCTJ62X47l4qENMJqtjVaohRtqmrm5$'
sshstatus = 'Pass' if sshstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
pingstatus = 'Pass' if pingstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
snmpstatus = 'Pass' if snmpstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'
event_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J2WNVGIFP6aRjRs4IB5PgljyV7XUlMr$'

connectivity_result = f"Connectivity Test Results:\nSSH - {sshstatus}\nSNMP - {snmpstatus}\nICMP - {pingstatus}\nEvent ID - {event_id}"

connectivity_result = json.dumps(connectivity_result).replace('"','')

actions.name: VE - Snow Incident Escalate to delivery
actions.title: VE - Snow Incident Escalate to delivery
